website_summaries.verdict: The lids of these cereal dispensers clip tight on 4 sides to help keep your cereal really fresh.
pros: Can hold a good amount of cereal
Comes with label stickers and a brush to help clean the containers
cons: These cereal dispensers may not keep out bugs

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for organizing and keeping cereal fresh
customer_reviews.text: Found this item on a pantry organizing site and ordered it. I was impressed with how much it holds and has much more room than I expected. I like that it has flat sides, so that it takes up less space by being able to nestle side by side much easier than a previous set I had with curved sides. No more boxes all over the place, half open, not knowing if the cereal is stale or not.
customer_reviews.author: B.girl

customer_reviews.title: Large containers that fit a whole bag of cereal !
customer_reviews.text: I really underestimated these cereal storage containers. I thought it would only fit half a bag of cereal and then leave the remaining half in the plastic bag but BOY WAS I WRONG! I buy the value packs of cereal from BJS and literally one of these containers fits one whole bag of cereal. So I’m not left with remaining cereal in the plastic, this container fits the whole bag perfectly which is reassuring because who doesn’t hate stale cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Tight seals
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like that it has a tight seal all around. I bought it to contain cereal and keep ants out .
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: They work great to keep stuff like cereal, dog food, flour fresh and easy to pour. Only down side is they don't include white or silver sharpie to write in the black stickers, so get one when you order these as they are in the add on items
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Shipment needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving it a four star rating because when I received them one of the clips was broken But other than that they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to close and seal.
customer_reviews.text: In the future I will stick with "Rubbermaid" brand products.
customer_reviews.author: J Lochaby

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight
customer_reviews.text: Not a airtight container lid which isnt good living at a humid climate place.. to late to return
customer_reviews.author: Sook

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The storage container is well designed. It solves the storage problem of various grains in my kitchen. The opening of the lid allows me to control the amount of grains I need.The tightness of the storage container is also good. I have tested that it won't leak at all. I can safely put my cornflakes in it.I'll also buy a few more storage containers for kids' snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Liu

customer_reviews.title: Nice tight seals with the rubber gaskets
customer_reviews.text: I use these to store 1kg spools of 3D printer filament in a very humid and dusty environment.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Inability to close fully
customer_reviews.text: Containers don’t close properly. Won’t buy again or suggest 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: PatelP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these containers for my baking. They hold an entire bag of flour and almost 2 bags of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect see through storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing cereal or rice. Does not take up slot of space in the cabinets and east to clean
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Getting more the pantry is going be filled
customer_reviews.text: We are buying more Big hit for all size hands to get in product and out. This company has fans
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Lids Fit well. Doesn’t smell after cleaning. Good quality and kids can open it too.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage containers
customer_reviews.text: They are good for kitchen storage, the lids don't close easily you always have to struggle a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amti

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: All my cereals and rice in an air tight container
customer_reviews.author: becky hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, better then I got at WalMart, even came with a cleaning tool
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Struggle with closing a little. But overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Connie Pribbenow

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing many different pantry items, and small Knick knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Small but decent
customer_reviews.text: One of mine arrived broken. The rest seem to be fine products. They were a little smaller than I had intended, but that is certainly on me for not checking better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Overall mediocre product. Low quality - spend the extra money for a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pantry organizing tool!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my house argues over cereal. Well now everyone has their own container! No more guessing when the kids are running out, no more stale cereal!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: No harmful chemicals and nice airtight seal.
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly in perfect condition and working order. Only issue is flake cereal hangs up a bit when pouring, but just use your free hand to help it along.
customer_reviews.author: Russ K.

customer_reviews.title: Broken container
customer_reviews.text: I like the containers but one was broken in the package that was sent to me. The container is bowed in and the lid won’t snap on. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: PDH

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We had problems with ants getting into our cereal so this really helped. Ant problem solved. No more ants.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gonzalez Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible.....
customer_reviews.text: Like these better than keeping my cereal in boxes, as the boxes always popped open. Often have difficulty pouring cereal out of the spout. A few of my containers seemed warped and wouldn’t seal. Also, they take up way too much room in my pantry. They don’t sit flush with each other, as the lids are quite bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected. Lots of Clips.
customer_reviews.text: thinner than expected, so don't hold an entire bag of cereal. the tops clip on for all four sides, which is alot of clipping. and the caps (on the top) are not quite so secure. just got them, so have to test wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: metadoc

customer_reviews.title: They work and they save me time and money
customer_reviews.text: Simple as that. I decided to get rid of the cereal boxes and put cereal into these babies. They allow me to see when cereal runs low and I am no longer wasting trips to the store or throwing away old, stale boxes of cereal after buying too much. The one thing I wish is that the mouths opened a bit wider to allow a more free flow of cereal but I can use my (clean) finger to nudge out the goods.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: These look to be exceptional storage containers. The covers attach easily, and they're easy to clean. I use ours to soak and clean dog toys. I've used others brands, and on occasion have had leakage. So far, no leakage of water from these. The shape is a little more convenient than other similarly sized containers. Additionally, they're light weight, but sufficiently strong, making them idea for a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: DreamyOneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sealing the big opening doesn’t help much if you can’t seal the small one.
customer_reviews.text: Although the top may have a seal, the flip up spout does not. It doesn’t stay closed well either. To make it work I’ve tried squeezing the sides, closing the lid and then releasing my grip to form a slight vacuum to help keep the spout lid closed. If I had it to do again I’d find something more reliable. I probably keep these and hope my workaround at least keeps any bugs out. I bought them to store cereal.
customer_reviews.author: ©ooper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. When I buy large boxes of cereal, some get eaten faster than others. With the cereals in a air tight container it will stay fresher longer. I made the right purchase. Product is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Biehler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These containers are perfect for storing any kind of dry goods. Rice, cereal, instant potatoes, pasta, flour, sugar. They work absolutely perfectly. I have bought 3 sets of them. I wanted to make sure I had extras if I need them again for more things. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Great value but
customer_reviews.text: One lid was broken. I deducted a star for sturdiness and durability for this issue. Seeing this was during shipping. I’m going to return/exchange, it’s just one small seal. I’ll just put the cereal that goes fast in that one.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: BAKHUK Cereal storage container.
customer_reviews.text: Cereal storage container. Had a little bit of difficulty getting the lid to snap on it first but it seems like it will provide a good seal. Large enough to fit most of a huge bag of rice inside. I like the slim fit in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: food canesters
customer_reviews.text: containers are great but but labels are black nothing to write with brush is so cheap i wouldn't give it to a kid for their kitchen set if you send garbage with product don't expect a good review
customer_reviews.author: Francisco gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to store our cereal in. This allowed me to give our kids more freedom to get there own cereal in the morning - so thankful for that!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, we store our cereals in these, they are easy to open and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Cereal keepers
customer_reviews.text: Good tight fitting lids. Holds a good quantity of cereal. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought something else for cereal
customer_reviews.text: They're sturdy and great for sugar or flour, but our cereal (special k and bite-size shredded wheat) doesn't flow freely from the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

product_meta.title: BAKHUK Cereal Storage Container - Large Sealed Cans 4L (136oz) in 4 Colors, with Stickers and Brushes, for Cereals, Flour, Coffee, Pet Food, etc.
feature_bullets: Package contains: 4 sealed cans in 4 colors + 2 kraft label stickers + 1 brush. The unique 4-color sealing rubber ring helps you better classify foods.

Large capacity: Each sealed container has a capacity of 4L, and length is 24.5cm/9.8cm, width is 8cm/3.2inch, and height is 24cm/9.6inch. Large capacity, suitable for storing cereals, macaroni, snacks, sugar, nuts, beans, pet food and so on.
High quality: Sealed cans are made of food-grade plastic, non-toxic and odorless. Can be used in refrigerators and dishwashers.

Storage Assistant: Half-Flip design for easy access to food. The design of the four-side buckles makes the lid more securely sealed, effectively preventing food from spilling, blocking the outside air, and ensuring the freshness of the food.

Confidence Pack: Label stickers can help you to mark the food's name and date at any time. The included brush facilitates regular cleaning of the canister. The long handle can reach the bottom of the can to effectively remove dead stains.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
